means: 租赁权，租赁期，租赁物( leasehold的名词复数 )

list.abs: 金融词汇 ... leasehold 租赁土地。 leasehold property 租赁财产。 leaseholder 租赁人。.
法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 批租土地 leasehold 批租土地财产 leasehold property 批租土地权益 leasehold interest.

会计专... ... 1511 租赁资产 leased assets 152 租赁权益改良 leasehold improvements 1561 未完工程 construction in progress.
leasehold estate 批租土地屋leasehold interest 批租土地权益；租赁权益leasehold system 批租制度；租地制度

entry.def: If a building or land is described as leasehold, it is allowed to be used in return for payment according to the terms of a lease.

example.ex: I went into a leasehold property at four hundred and fifty pounds rent per year.
example.tran: 我以每年450英镑的租金租了一所房子。

entry.tran: （按租约使用房屋或土地的）租赁权
entry.def: If you have the leasehold of a building or piece of land, you have the legal right to use it for a period of time as arranged according to a lease.

auth_sentence.content: Leaseholds are preferred, though with a bit of bargaining, a freehold can usually be secured.
auth_sentence.res_content: Leaseholds are preferred, though with a bit of bargaining, a freehold can usually be secured.
